thread.title_full: Superstar Rajinikanth Amy Jackson Akshay Kumar fight scene for Shankars 2point0 - Tamil Movie News

title: Superstar Rajinikanth Amy Jackson Akshay Kumar fight scene for Shankars 2point0 - Tamil Movie News
text: 'Thala 57' Title, 'Thalapathy 61' Cast & Crew and Vikram's Fresh pair Director Shankar and his army of creators are putting in a lot of hardwork to give the audiences a never before viewing experience in ‘2.0’. The film is almost complete and the climax fight portions are currently being shot. In the climax a tough fight sequence involves Superstar Rajini pitted against Akshay Kumar and Amy Jackson and is being conducted in specially erected sets in Chennai. A source close to the team has revealed that even at his age and health condition, Rajini has given his 100 percent for the fight doing most of the risky shots without a stunt double. ‘2.0’ produced at a budget of 400 crores by Lyca Productions is going to be a grand Diwali treat for fans this year.
